name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Network Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in troubleshooting and analytical problem-solving skills essential for effective network management. My comprehensive expertise includes configuring and managing complex network systems utilizing technologies such as **TCP/IP**, **BGP**, **OSPF**, **EIGRP**, **VLANs**, **VPNs**, and various **firewalls**, **proxies**, and **load balancers**. 
In my previous roles, I have developed and maintained high-performance network solutions for sectors like healthcare and finance, ensuring compliance with industry standards. I possess a robust understanding of network architecture principles, network security protocols, and the intricacies of network traffic management.
Additionally, my adaptability extends to full-stack development, where I’ve employed **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter** to build efficient solutions, leveraging frameworks like **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, as well as cloud services on **Azure** and **AWS**. This unique blend of networking and programming skills allows me to propose innovative solutions that enhance network functionality and security.
